tool_description: Generates structured app metadata including title, description, keywords, and categories based on app details and target platform requirements.

app_name.description: The primary name of the application

platform.description: Target platform: ios, android, or both

category.description: Primary app category such as Games, Productivity, Social

app_description.description: Detailed description of app functionality and features

target_keywords.description: List of primary keywords to emphasize

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be 'ios', 'android', or 'both'.
Category not supported: Provided category is not recognized for the specified platform.
Description too long: App description exceeds platform character limits.
Missing required field: app_name, platform, category, and app_description are mandatory.
usage: Provide app_name, platform, category, and app_description. Optionally include target_keywords for keyword optimization. Returns formatted metadata ready for store listings.

generated_title.description: Optimized app title within platform character limits

short_description.description: Concise app description for store previews

full_description.description: Complete app description optimized for discovery
